title: Carve her name with pride
creator_contributor_role: Rank Organisation Film Productions, production company
subject_group: Literature/English literature - Film and video adaptations
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Women in war
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Biographical films
description: Based on R.J. Minney's novel this inspiring true story of war heroine, Violette Szabo, who volunteered to be parachuted into France as a secret agent to re-organise a shattered resistance group. Virginia McKenna gives the performance of her career as the courageous secret agent, and this magnificent film ensures that no-one will forget Violette's bravery and conviction in what she believed in most - freedom from tyranny. Also stars Paul Scofield, Jack Warner, Denise Grey and Maurice Ronet.
